page.title: 08Graffiti 2
page.content:
It is quite common to find the names of local Football Teams on walls. Names of boyfriends or girlfriends are popular too.
Messages ar written usually in marker pen or paint from a spray can. Other pens, pencil, chalk are sometimes used. Some people even scratch their messages on.
The subways have become so covered in untidy scribble recently that local schools have started to paint pictures on the bare concrete walls of the subway to make them more attractive and interesting. They hope children will not vandalise the place so much if they have pictures of cartoon characters, road vehicles, film stars, musicians etc.
